r.d: This is the MySQL MDB2 driver.
r.n:
first unbundled release from MDB2 core
- fixed new_link support (bug #4308) - dont just check for isset() for boolean values in order to support setting them false as well (bug #4373) - ensure SQL injection protection in all _quote() methods (was missing in some decimal, float, time, date and timestamp implementations) - dont inherite from the mysqli driver anymore to prevent indirect dependency on mysqli
